page.title: 20THE HOLIDAY SEASON
page.content: During the summer a number of{TOURISTS visit the area. Some accomodation is offered in{self catering chalets}on the farms of{Gilfachwen}and{Cwmmeudwy. These are fully booked during the summer. A few{private houses}and{farms offer{bed and breakfast,}and the{Porth {Hotel}attracts visiting anglers. The area is{centrally situated}for visiting the nearby{coastal resorts, {historical and scenic places.}Towns such as{CARMARTHEN}and {ABERYSTWYTH} are within easy driving distance. Many visitors inside and outside the area come to shop in the village, particularly when the weather is not suitable for going to the beach or touring. Many tourists passing through the area often stop in the village for a meal. A{car}is essential for any {tourist.}No serious attempt has been made to develop the{tourist industry.
